Text: But with a 529 plan, individuals may contribute up to $75,000 ($150,000 for couples) per beneficiary if the contribution is treated as if it were spread over a five-year period.
Cause: the contribution is treated as if it were spread over a five-year period.
Effect: But with a 529 plan, individuals may contribute up to $75,000 ($150,000 for couples) per beneficiary
Sentence: <e2>But with a 529 plan, individuals may contribute up to $75,000 ($150,000 for couples) per beneficiary</e2> if <e1>the contribution is treated as if it were spread over a five-year period.</e1>
